name: ElmArk.Msgs
comment:
A Msg type for dealing with API responses

@docs Msg

types.name: Msg
types.comment: A Msg representing one of the various HTTP response types.

name: ElmArk.Api

values.name: devNet
values.comment:
Contains the URL and required headers for making
a request to the Ark dev/test network

    devNet == { url = "http://167.114.29.52:4002/"
    , headers =
        [ (header "nethash" "578e820911f24e039733b45e4882b73e301f813a0d2c31330dafda84534ffa23")
        , (header "version" "1.1.1")
        , (header "port" "4002")
        ]
    }

values.name: mainNet
values.comment:
Contains the URL and required headers for making
a request to the Ark mainnet

Ark main net, refers to this IP
"http://37.59.129.164:4001/"

    mainNet == { url = "https://api.arknode.net/"
    , headers =
        [ (header "nethash" "6e84d08bd299ed97c212c886c98a57e36545c8f5d645ca7eeae63a8bd62d8988")
        , (header "version" "1.0.1")
        , (header "port" "4001")
        ]
    }

values.name: send
values.comment:
Sends the HTTP request

    mainNet
        |> getBalance "AUexKjGtgsSpVzPLs6jNMM6vJ6znEVTQWK"
        |> send ReceiveAccountBalance decodeBalance
values.type: (Result.Result Http.Error a -> msg) -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> ( ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead, ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestBody ) -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg

name: ElmArk.Block

aliases.name: Block
aliases.comment:
Record for an Ark blockchain block
Sample JSON:

    {
      "id": "16338263029223576159",
      "version": 0,
      "timestamp": 23958872,
      "height": 2953518,
      "previousBlock": "7539730724110889322",
      "numberOfTransactions": 1,
      "totalAmount": 100000000,
      "totalFee": 10000000,
      "reward": 200000000,
      "payloadLength": 32,
      "payloadHash": "e380f252e9d92c9085d6cfc6d14b7adbd43fc38f1036bd85f68565e7a912c8c6",
      "generatorPublicKey": "02a0ed5604868461a87639f58bd3a55f661774c3cbb705a735f58c50087f942c3d",
      "generatorId": "AHazk56nvQ3isZrYkarJV1RPcDUrQocmfR",
      "blockSignature": "3045022100fdd83eb7be8238837841375e7730109600223e1735a29ec1db9bf5763a3d2c9d0220402351074b1a24b5bf640617b07c8e8cfaa72896f2438bb44235537af06730ed",
      "confirmations": 43,
      "totalForged": "210000000"
    }
aliases.type: { id : String , version : Int , timestamp : Int , height : Int , previousBlock : String , numberOfTransactions : Int , totalAmount : Int , totalFee : Int , reward : Int , payloadLength : Int , payloadHash : String , generatorPublicKey : String , generatorId : String , blockSignature : String , confirmations : Int , totalForged : String }

aliases.name: BlockHeight
aliases.comment: The current block height
aliases.type: { success : Bool, height : Int, id : String }

aliases.name: BlockResponse
aliases.comment:
Record used to represent the response from getting a block
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "block": {
            "id": "16338263029223576159",
            "version": 0,
            "timestamp": 23958872,
            "height": 2953518,
            "previousBlock": "7539730724110889322",
            "numberOfTransactions": 1,
            "totalAmount": 100000000,
            "totalFee": 10000000,
            "reward": 200000000,
            "payloadLength": 32,
            "payloadHash": "e380f252e9d92c9085d6cfc6d14b7adbd43fc38f1036bd85f68565e7a912c8c6",
            "generatorPublicKey": "02a0ed5604868461a87639f58bd3a55f661774c3cbb705a735f58c50087f942c3d",
            "generatorId": "AHazk56nvQ3isZrYkarJV1RPcDUrQocmfR",
            "blockSignature": "3045022100fdd83eb7be8238837841375e7730109600223e1735a29ec1db9bf5763a3d2c9d0220402351074b1a24b5bf640617b07c8e8cfaa72896f2438bb44235537af06730ed",
            "confirmations": 43,
            "totalForged": "210000000"
        }
    }

aliases.name: BlockSearch
aliases.comment: Result of searching blocks
aliases.type: { success : Bool, blocks : List ElmArk.Block.Block, count : Int }

aliases.name: Epoch
Fee
Fees
aliases.comment:
Object representing the current fees
Sample JSON:

    {
      "send": 10000000,
      "vote": 100000000,
      "secondsignature": 500000000,
      "delegate": 2500000000,
      "multisignature": 500000000
    }
aliases.type: { send : Int , vote : Int , secondsignature : Int , delegate : Int , multisignature : Int }

aliases.name: FeesResponse
Milestone
Nethash
Reward
Status
aliases.comment:
Status of the blockchain
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "epoch": "2017-03-21T13:00:00.000Z",
        "height": 2954161,
        "fee": 10000000,
        "milestone": 0,
        "nethash": "6e84d08bd299ed97c212c886c98a57e36545c8f5d645ca7eeae63a8bd62d8988",
        "reward": 200000000,
        "supply": 13090832200000000
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool , epoch : String , height : Int , fee : Int , milestone : Int , nethash : String , reward : Int , supply : Int }

aliases.name: Supply

values.name: getBlock
values.comment:
Get info about a block

    mainNet
        |> getBlock "16338263029223576159"

values.name: getBlockHeight
values.comment:
Gets the current block height

    mainNet
        |> getBlockHeight

values.name: getEpoch
values.comment:
Gets the epoch

    mainNet
        |> getEpoch

values.name: getFee
values.comment:
Gets the current fees for a transaction

    mainNet
        |> getFee

values.name: getFees
values.comment:
Get the current fees

    mainNet
        |> getFees

values.name: getMilestone
values.comment:
Gets the current milestone

    mainNet
        |> getMilestone

values.name: getNethash
values.comment:
Gets the current netHash

    mainNet
        |> getNethash

values.name: getReward
values.comment:
Gets the current block reward

    mainNet
        |> getReward

values.name: getStatus
values.comment:
Gets the current block status

    mainNet
        |> getStatus

values.name: getSupply
values.comment:
Gets the current block supply

    mainNet
        |> getSupply

values.name: searchBlocks
values.comment:
Search all blocksblocks.

Available search params:
limit, orderBy, offset, generatorPublicKey, totalAmount,
totalFee, reward, previousBlock, height

    mainNet
        |> searchBlocks [("orderBy", "timestamp"), ("limit", "2")]
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead -> ( ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead, ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestBody )

name: ElmArk.Peer

aliases.name: GetPeer
aliases.comment:
GetPeer is the record for the response of getPeer
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "peer": {
            "ip": "54.38.48.170",
            "port": 4001,
            "version": "1.0.2",
            "errors": 6,
            "os": "linux4.4.0-104-generic",
            "height": 2953767,
            "status": "ETIMEOUT",
            "delay": 1060
        }
    }

aliases.name: Peer
aliases.comment:
Peer record for making up the list of peers in getPeers response
Sample JSON:

    {
        "ip": "185.183.156.115",
        "port": 4001,
        "version": "1.0.2",
        "errors": 0,
        "os": "linux4.4.0-104-generic",
        "height": 2956067,
        "status": "OK",
        "delay": 199
    }
aliases.type: { ip : String , inboundPort : Int , version : String , errors : Int , os : String , height : Int , status : String , delay : Int }

aliases.name: PeerVersion
aliases.comment:
PeerVersion is the record representing the JSON response of getPeer
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "version": "1.0.2",
        "build": ""
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool, version : String, build : String }

aliases.name: Peers
aliases.comment:
List of peers returned by getPeers
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "peers": [
            {
                "ip": "54.38.48.170",
                "port": 4001,
                "version": "1.0.2",
                "errors": 1,
                "os": "linux4.4.0-104-generic",
                "height": 2953767,
                "status": "OK",
                "delay": 463
            },
            {
                "ip": "185.183.156.115",
                "port": 4001,
                "version": "1.0.2",
                "errors": 0,
                "os": "linux4.4.0-104-generic",
                "height": 2956067,
                "status": "OK",
                "delay": 199
            }
        ]
    }

values.name: decodeGetPeer
values.comment: Parse JSON into GetPeer record

values.name: decodePeer
values.comment: Parse JSON into Peer record

values.name: decodePeerVersion
values.comment: Parses JSON into PeerVersion record

values.name: decodePeers
values.comment: Parse JSON into Peers record

values.name: encodeGetPeer
values.comment: Turn GetPeer record into JSON string

values.name: encodePeer
values.comment: Turn Peer record into JSON string

values.name: encodePeerVersion
values.comment: Turn PeerVersion record into JSON string

values.name: encodePeers
values.comment: Turn Peers record into JSON

values.name: getPeer
values.comment:
Get a single peer by IP and port

    mainNet
        |> getPeer "54.38.48.170" "4001"

values.name: getPeerVersion
values.comment:
Gets the peer version

    mainNet
        |> getPeerVersion

values.name: getPeers
values.comment:
Get all the peers

    mainNet
        |> getPeers

Get pending multi signature transactions for an account

name: ElmArk.Delegate

aliases.name: Delegate
aliases.comment:
A delegate object inside the delegate response
Sample JSON:

    {
        "username": "bioly",
        "address": "AbUdMhk96FbzxH7vDYAwdyqUELmLopZV5x",
        "publicKey": "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181",
        "vote": "178070099134995",
        "producedblocks": 57662,
        "missedblocks": 254,
        "rate": 2,
        "approval": 1.36,
        "productivity": 99.56
    }
aliases.type: { username : String , address : String , publicKey : String , vote : String , producedblocks : Int , missedblocks : Int , rate : Int , approval : Float , productivity : Float }

aliases.name: DelegateFee
DelegateResponse
aliases.comment:
Information about a delegate
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "delegate": {
            "username": "bioly",
            "address": "AbUdMhk96FbzxH7vDYAwdyqUELmLopZV5x",
            "publicKey": "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181",
            "vote": "178070099134995",
            "producedblocks": 57662,
            "missedblocks": 254,
            "rate": 2,
            "approval": 1.36,
            "productivity": 99.56
        }
    }

aliases.name: DelegateSearch
aliases.comment:
Makes up the array of delegates in the delegate search
Sample JSON:

    {
      "username": "bioly",
      "address": "AbUdMhk96FbzxH7vDYAwdyqUELmLopZV5x",
      "publicKey": "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181",
      "vote": "178069299134995",
      "producedblocks": 57658,
      "missedblocks": 254
    }
aliases.type: { username : String , address : String , publicKey : String , vote : String , producedblocks : Int , missedblocks : Int }

aliases.name: Delegates
DelegatesCount
ForgedBlocks
aliases.comment:
Blocks forged by an account
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "fees": "201040000000",
        "rewards": "11258400000000",
        "forged": "11459440000000"
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool, fees : String, rewards : String, forged : String }

aliases.name: GetDelegates
aliases.comment:
Item in the array returned by the getDelegates request
Sample JSON:

    {
        "username": "digitron",
        "address": "APVpLtN9NxsNMyhLucP4vmFHHyyV2QKx4t",
        "publicKey": "0339a6bb2aff249cd13b55fce2442703a1d488bae343a22fa09bbff46a6a64c5e2",
        "vote": "135880318033725",
        "producedblocks": 57905,
        "missedblocks": 146,
        "rate": 45,
        "approval": 1.04,
        "productivity": 99.75
    }
aliases.type: { username : String , address : String , publicKey : String , vote : String , producedblocks : Int , missedblocks : Int , rate : Int , approval : Float , productivity : Float }

aliases.name: GetDelegatesResponse
aliases.comment:
Response from getting delegates
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "delegates": [
            {
                "username": "arknet",
                "address": "AXzEMF7TC1aH3ax1Luxk6XdyKXDRxnBj4f",
                "publicKey": "0217ff1ec656f2354a899bde097bb3131a9730fe491bb87dedb96489120be9154f",
                "vote": "140295948126587",
                "producedblocks": 39615,
                "missedblocks": 31,
                "rate": 25,
                "approval": 1.07,
                "productivity": 99.92
            },
            {
                "username": "digitron",
                "address": "APVpLtN9NxsNMyhLucP4vmFHHyyV2QKx4t",
                "publicKey": "0339a6bb2aff249cd13b55fce2442703a1d488bae343a22fa09bbff46a6a64c5e2",
                "vote": "135880318033725",
                "producedblocks": 57905,
                "missedblocks": 146,
                "rate": 45,
                "approval": 1.04,
                "productivity": 99.75
            }
        ],
        "totalCount": 618
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool , delegates : List ElmArk.Delegate.GetDelegates , totalCount : Int }

aliases.name: NextForgers
aliases.comment:
List of the next forgers as returned by getNextForgers
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "currentBlock": 2955411,
        "currentSlot": 2996756,
        "delegates": [
            "020431436cf94f3c6a6ba566fe9e42678db8486590c732ca6c3803a10a86f50b92",
            "03ca4edbdc4e83eb6f1b8780a532c74a3708d51f281b6bfb9a308d49c47d3ac90d",

            "028f9f37a1fbf95bfa5b302032806116b27fd74996df7bcd6188c982f75e894ca4",
            "02a0ed5604868461a87639f58bd3a55f661774c3cbb705a735f58c50087f942c3d",
            "02a6b88567f86fa22d3c958f470c1645b3f65aa555e00c5bb0eecd2886eab80d34",
            "035a0302ddd571bb821f6b069450814cb29fc927f14f146491fd5c9b3ab57d8ca8",
            "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181",
            "027acdf24b004a7b1e6be2adf746e3233ce034dbb7e83d4a900f367efc4abd0f21",
            "027c550ecc71e4d9b832cf83c1c5c4d7c22dc43e3a451fea887c82a6ef55bf52fa"
        ]
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool , currentBlock : Int , currentSlot : Int , delegates : List String }

aliases.name: Voter

A single item in the accounts list returned by the getVoters call

        "publicKey": "0358a9d50272413bcf94314ca89745a6324aed911bd949b0fb6105fdfd0e291376",

values.name: getDelegateByPublicKey
values.comment:
Gets info for a delegate by their public key

    mainNet
        |> getDelegateByPublicKey "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181"

values.name: getDelegateByUsername
values.comment:
Gets info for a delegate by their username

    mainNet
        |> getDelegateByUsername "bioly"

values.name: getDelegateFee
values.comment:
Gets the current fee to become a delegate

    mainNet
        |> getDelegateFee

values.name: getDelegates
values.comment:
Gets all delegates filtered by optoinal parameters
Available params: orderBy, limit, offset

    mainNet
        |> getDelegates [("limit", "2"), ("orderBy", "productivity")]
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead -> ( ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead, ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestBody )

values.name: getDelegatesCount
values.comment:
Get info about a block

    mainNet
        |> getDelegatesCount "AUexKjGtgsSpVzPLs6jNMM6vJ6znEVTQWK"

values.name: getForgedByAccount
values.comment:
Gets forged blocks by a given public key

    mainNet
        |> getForgedByAccount "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181"

values.name: getNextForgers
values.comment:
Gets the next forgers

    mainNet
        |> getNextForgers

values.name: getVoters
values.comment:
Gets all the voters for a given public key

    mainNet
        |> getVoters "02c0b645f19ab304d25aae3add139edd9f6ca9fd0d98e57a808100de0e93832181"

values.name: searchDelegates
values.comment:
Search for specific delegates.
Available parameters: limit

    mainNet
        |> searchDelegates "biol" [("limit", "10")]
values.type: String -> List ( String, String ) -> ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead -> ( ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead, ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestBody )

name: ElmArk.Transaction

aliases.name: Asset
GetTransaction
aliases.comment:
Record representing the getTransaction response
Sample JSON:

       {
           "success": true,
           "transaction": {
               "id": "a38dc6b9e6679be706d5b39eef7dd0a7a10011e63da7623082106d90834e23e1",
               "blockid": "6119254423291710282",
               "height": 2411892,
               "type": 0,
               "timestamp": 19468149,
               "amount": 1,
               "fee": 10000000,
               "vendorField": "turnip",
               "senderId": "Aasu14aTs9ipZdy1FMv7ay1Vqn3jPskA8t",
               "recipientId": "AFuNopRKj2VwhaTWQraZgPTT5nofXskBTN",
               "senderPublicKey": "02c7455bebeadde04728441e0f57f82f972155c088252bf7c1365eb0dc84fbf5de",
               "signature": "3044022030ded9cd7a1cf37f6ae85b35fd478502c916d493ecb1c6df8b1a8392323559d3022040a45aac97a6d915bc19f9ad3927395e3240dacb1b81ad00d871182e4fa130b7",
               "asset": {},
               "confirmations": 544505
           }
       }

aliases.name: Transaction
aliases.comment:
Transaction is the transaction field of the GetTransaction record
Sample JSON:

    {

values.name: decodeAsset
values.comment: Parse JSON into Asset record

values.name: decodeGetTransaction
values.comment: Parse JSON into GetTransaction record

values.name: decodeTransaction
values.comment: Parse JSON into Transaction record

values.name: encodeAsset
values.comment: Turn Asset record into JSON

values.name: encodeGetTransaction
values.comment: Turn GetTransaction into JSON string

values.name: encodeTransaction
values.comment: Turn Transaction into JSON string

values.name: getTransaction
values.comment:
Get the current fee for generating a signature

    mainNet
        |> getTransaction "a38dc6b9e6679be706d5b39eef7dd0a7a10011e63da7623082106d90834e23e1"

values.name: getTransactions
values.comment:
Get the current fee for generating a signature
  Available Parameters: blockId, limit, type, orderBy, offset, senderPublicKey,
    vendorField, ownerPublicKey, ownerADdress, senderId, recipientId, amount, fee

    mainNet
        |> getTransactions [("limit", "10"), ("orderBy", "amount")]
values.type: List ( String, String ) -> ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead -> ( ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestHead, ElmArk.Api.Model.RequestBody )

values.name: getUnconfirmedTransaction
values.comment:
Get an unconfirmed transaction

    mainNet
        |> getUnconfirmedTransaction "a38dc6b9e6679be706d5b39eef7dd0a7a10011e63da7623082106d90834e23e1"

values.name: getUnconfirmedTransactions
values.comment:
Get all unconfirmed transactions

    mainNet
        |> getUnconfirmedTransactions

name: ElmArk.Account

aliases.name: Account
aliases.comment: A single account
aliases.type: { address : String , unconfirmedBalance : String , balance : String , publicKey : String , unconfirmedSignature : Int , secondSignature : Int , secondPublicKey : String , multisignatures : List String , u_multisignatures : List String }

aliases.name: Accounts
aliases.comment: Represents the result of running the getAccount

aliases.name: Balance
aliases.comment:
The balance record returned by ark.

Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "balance": "21231062440",
        "unconfirmedBalance": "21231062440"
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool, balance : String, unconfirmedBalance : String }

Get the current delegate fee

        |> getDelegates "AbUdMhk96FbzxH7vDYAwdyqUELmLopZV5x"

values.name: getTopAccounts
values.comment:
Get a list of top accounts

    mainNet
        |> getTopAccounts

name: ElmArk.Loader

aliases.name: AutoConfigure
BlockStatus
aliases.comment:
Record for the block status response
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "loaded": false,
        "now": 2951259,
        "blocksCount": 0
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool, loaded : Bool, now : Int, blocksCount : Int }

aliases.name: Network
aliases.comment:
Network portion of the autoconfigure loader respnose

    {
        "nethash": "6e84d08bd299ed97c212c886c98a57e36545c8f5d645ca7eeae63a8bd62d8988",
        "token": "ARK",
        "symbol": "",
        "explorer": "https://explorer.ark.io",
        "version": 23
    }
aliases.type: { nethash : String , token : String , symbol : String , explorer : String , version : Int }

aliases.name: SyncStatus
aliases.comment:
Record for the syncStatus response
Sample JSON:

    {
        "success": true,
        "syncing": false,
        "blocks": 0,
        "height": 2955799,
        "id": "14925783039630880151"
    }
aliases.type: { success : Bool , syncing : Bool , blocks : Int , height : Int , id : String }
